title: Sell Octomore Whisky
metaDescription: Sell your Octomore whisky. We buy the .1, .2, and .3 releases, 10 Year, and X.1 series. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy the world's most heavily peated whisky.
introParagraph: Octomore, produced by Bruichladdich, is the super-heavily peated cult favorite. We purchase all releases, including the .1 (Scottish Barley), .2 (Travel Retail), .3 (Islay Barley), and .4 (Virgin Oak) editions, as well as the 10 Year Olds. Early releases (1.1, 2.1, etc.) command premium prices.
photoChecklist: Front label (identifying the exact edition like 07.1)
conditionFactors: Tube condition (matte black tubes show scuffs easily)
pricingFactors: Edition Number (older releases like 01.1 and 02.1 are very rare)
PPM count (while interesting, the release number matters more for price)
Release type (.3 Islay Barley often commands a premium)

faqs.question: Which Octomore is the most valuable?
faqs.answer: The earliest releases (Edition 01.1, 02.1) and special editions like Event Horizon or Orpheus are the most valuable.

faqs.question: Do you buy the current .1 releases?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy all Octomore releases, even recent ones, though older bottles pay more.

faqs.question: Do I need the black tube?
faqs.answer: Yes, Octomore always comes in a distinctive tin or tube. It is expected for a complete sale.

faqs.question: Do you buy Octomore 10 Year?
faqs.answer: Yes, the limited 10 Year releases are highly desirable.

faqs.question: What is the 'x.4' series?
faqs.answer: The .4 series typically involves virgin oak maturation and is very collectible.

faqs.question: How do I sell my collection?
faqs.answer: Send us a list or photo of the tubes. We can usually identify them quickly.
